arts.ttl: Not Mbappé nor Vini: Real Madrid’s young prodigy turning heads in Europe
arts.sum: “There’s a lot of talk about Endrick, saying he’s played little, that I’m not giving him minutes... Excluding the Copa, he’s played just 160 minutes this season over 32 matches.

arts.ttl: From Brazil: Surprise as Real Madrid could sign Manchester City player, would be rapid City exit
arts.sum: Manchester City’s Savinho has ended up on Real Madrid’s transfer agenda, according to a surprise claim from Brazil. The winger arrived at Manchester City last summer and signed a contract until 2029. Pep Guardiola has used him regularly as he made 27 appearances in all competitions, and it includes 19 starts. arts.ttl: Real Madrid boss Carlo Ancelotti lavishes praise on key player amid Bernabeu exit speculation
arts.sum: Real Madrid head coach Carlo Ancelotti hails Aurelien Tchouameni's performance in his preferred midfield position amid the speculation surrounding his future.

arts.ttl: How to win the Champions League: Real Madrid
arts.sum: Watch the trailer for new BBC documentary 'How to win the Champions League: Real Madrid'.

arts.ttl: Neymar says Mbappé 'jealous' of Messi at PSG
arts.sum: Brazil striker Neymar said his former Paris Saint-Germain teammate Kylian Mbappé became "a little jealous" after superstar Lionel Messi joined the French club in August 2021 in a free transfer.

arts.ttl: Player Ratings: Real Madrid 5 - 2 Celta Vigo; 2025 Copa del Rey
arts.sum: Outside of the penalty, he sprayed inch-perfect long balls, delivered crunching tackles, and maintained a high defensive line. Set up Mbappe’s goal with a defense-splitting pass that bypassed both the forward and midfield lines.

arts.ttl: Three observations from Real Madrid’s 5-2 win vs Celta Vigo
arts.sum: Ancelotti, whenever asked about youngsters, has said one thing: “I am here to win football matches, not to give minutes to young players.” Standard Copa del Rey practice continued for Real Madrid when they let in two goals in the last few minutes of the game — clearly taking their foot off the pedal — and let the match go into extra time.

arts.ttl: Endrick says goals for Rüdiger: 'Never praises me'
arts.sum: Real Madrid forward Endrick praised teammate Antonio Rudiger for guiding him through his goal drought, dedicating his brace in Madrid's 5-2 Copa del Rey win over Celta Vigo on Thursday to the defender.

arts.ttl: Managing Madrid Podcast: Real Madrid 5 - 2 Celta Vigo, Post-game, Copa del Rey Round-of-16
arts.sum: On this episode of the Managing Madrid Podcast, Kiyan Sobhani discusses talking points from Real Madrid ’s 5 - 2 win over Celta Vigo, including: It also serves as a means for Real Madrid fans to connect and discuss the team.

arts.ttl: Endrick scores in extra time to help Madrid top Celta in Copa. Titleholder Athletic loses to Osasuna
arts.sum: Real Madrid needed two goals from Endrick in extra time to get past Celta Vigo in the round of 16 of the Copa del Rey and avoid another embarrassing setback less than a week after losing 5-2 to Barcelona in the Spanish Super Cup final. The 18-year-old Endrick, who entered the match in the 79th, put Madrid ahead in the 108th with a shot from outside the area and then sealed the victory in the 119th after Valverde had added to the lead in the 112th.
